Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2016 05:45PM Affinity42 wrote: Hi, I bet you're feeling frustrated! As a former Social Worker, I definitely encourage you to contact your referring Physicians office and ask to speak to the clinic social worker, or patient care coordinator. You can then request assistance from them to aid in your being seen elsewhere in a more timely fashion.  Best of luck, I've been on the every 6 month Mammo and US train for two years and it does get easier to maneuver the office cultures with time.
